name: Ryan Mike
description: My names is Ryan Mike and am 40 I am a US Soldier deployed in Afghanistan. I am pretty easy going a good listener. Let me say that, what u r about to read may inspire u, denture u, make u sad, or even anger u. But i think that honesty is the best policy. Say it, and let the chips fall where thy may. I am a single father of a wonderful Boy of twelve. I’m a down to earth kind of guy.
